title.narrative: HIV IMPLEMENTATION ADOLESCENT

description.narrative: By 2021, Botswana fully implements policies and programmes towards the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals and targets and national aspirations., which contributes to Adolescents And Hiv/Aids, Care And Treatment Of Children Affected By Hiv And Aids, Hiv Prevention, Hiv â€“ General, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Pmtct And Infant Male Circumcision, Protect, Care And Support Children And Families Affected By Hiv, Treatment And Care Of Children Living With Hiv. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Increased evidence-generation and data gathering and analysis informs nutrition programming

sector.narrative: HIV and AIDS monitoring and bottleneck analysis

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2021, Botswana fully implements policies and programmes towards the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals andtargets and national aspirations.

description.narrative: With technical and financial support from UNICEF and in collaboration with Government and partners, approximately 443,868 adolescents and young people continued to access targeted combination HIV prevention, treatment, care and support interventions and services, as well as lifesaving information, through differentiated approaches and multiple service delivery platforms, including digital, interpersonal communication and community platforms, resulting in ;improved HIV, sexual and reproductive health and rights, sexual and gender-based violence and; COVID-19 knowledge, skills, attitudes, behaviors and practices amidst the double pandemics of HIV and COVID-19. | Status:Met | As-of Date:29/12/2021

title.narrative: Behavior change communication platform targeting adolescents and using T4D developed(46844), Text

baseline.value: Yes - Shuga radio programmed scaled up and U-Report rolled out

target.value: 2021:Shuga radio season three produced; shuga peer education programme implemented in 4 districts; ICT 124 platform with interactive game hosted; U-partners identified and supporting U-Report engagement.

actual.value: 2020:Shuga Radio season two produced; Shuga peer education programme implemented in 4 districts; ICT 124 platform with interactive game developed; 22,000 U-Reporters registered.
